DataElement.preferredName: Pain Medication Further Information Need Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether a person wants further information about their pain medication.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings._A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease._To or at a greater distance in time or space._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._Anything that is necessary but lacking; the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An unpleasant sensation induced by noxious stimuli and generally received by specialized nerve endings.:biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.

Concepts.definition: The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Property.preferredDefinition: To or at a greater distance in time or space.:Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.:Anything that is necessary but lacking; the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior.

Concepts.definition: To or at a greater distance in time or space.
Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

Anything that is necessary but lacking; the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
